snippet: Officials in Oakland County, outside Detroit, warned that they would cut off support if the collection of the Detroit Institute of Arts is used to raise money for the city’s creditors.
abstract: Officials in Oakland County, outside Detroit, warned that they would cut off support if the collection of the Detroit Institute of Arts is used to raise money for the city’s creditors.

headline.main: Detroit Institute of Arts Could Lose Regional Tax Funds
headline.print_headline: Detroit Institute of Arts Could Lose Tax Funds
